name: Foods of Fury (scalliongames, Cassa, sofiaee, Jose Villanueva, PaladinZayne111, tvilla)
name_original: Foods of Fury (scalliongames, Cassa, sofiaee, Jose Villanueva, PaladinZayne111, tvilla)
description:
Play as a radish named Rollo and save your fellow vegetable friends from getting fried! Take on an army of fast food fighters and use your enemies' weapons against them!

We'd love to hear your feedback!

Follow our development at  our social medias! https://linktr.ee/FoodsOfFury


How to Play: 

Defeat the enemies and rescue the vegetables from their cages! 

  • WASD to move 
  • Spacebar to jump 
  • Hold space to glide 
  • Left click to attack 
  • Right click for strong attack
  • Scroll to switch weapons 
  • Move your mouse to control the camera
  • Esc Button to pause or access Menu
Install instructions

Download and extract the "FoF_Build12.zip", double click the FoodsOfFury.exe to launch. Your virus software and/or Windows software may alert, but we promise the files are safe! To bypass the alert click the text that says "More Info" then click "Run Anyway".
